micro fusion:
; example of micro fusion
	inc		[addr1]			; read-modify micro fusion
	push		eax			; address-write micro fusion
	or		[addr2], 1		; two types of micro fusion
macro fusion:
; example of macro fusion
m1:	inc		eax			
	jz		m1			; macro fusion
	add		ebx, 5
	jne		m1			; second macro fusion
	sub		ebx, 2
	jc		m1			; trird macro fusion
	push		[addr1]
	and		[addr2], ebx
	jnp		m1			; macro fusion with memory operand
	and		eax, ebx
	jnp		m1			; macro fusion without memory operand
	inc		ebx
	inc		ebx			; instruction that can be fused get to the last decoder
LSD:
; example of Loop Stream Detecton
m1:	xor		eax, eax
	add		eax, 5
m2:	dec		ebx
	push		eax
	loop		m2		; folded cycle
	push		[addr1]	
	loop		m1		; main cycle
zeroing idioms:
; example of zeroing idioms
	xor		eax, eax		; zeroing with xor
	sub		rax, rax		; zeroing with sub
move elimination:
; example of move elimination
	mov		eax, ebx		; move elimination with 32bit registers
	mov		rax, rbx		; move elimination with 64bit registers
	mov		eax, eax		; move elimination with registor move to itself
